AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the black Dodge pickup truck: Vehicle driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., searched and impounded due to lack of insurance information, and also involved in the surveillance on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the white Malibu sedan: Vehicle rented by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. from Hertz at the Laredo International Airport, registered to Hertz Dallas-Fort Worth, and involved in the surveillance on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the vehicle: Refers to the white Malibu sedan in this context, designed to hold five people
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Paved road with two lanes and no shoulder, where Agent Jorge Luis Trevino encountered the vehicles, located adjacent to the United States Border Patrol station parking lot
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mills Bennett Road: Dirt road intersecting Farm-to-Market Road 2050, approximately five miles south of the United States Border Patrol Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Freer immigr: Checkpoint near the intersection of Mills Bennett Road and Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 59: Location where Agent Jorge Luis Trevino was stationed on the evening of February 4, 2013
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the wind farm on Farm-to-Market Road 205: Wind farm located on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 with its entrance and office on the west side, between twelve and fifteen miles from the checkpoint on Highway 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Pablo Road: Road south of the wind farm on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, extending to the east and providing vehicle access to Highway 16
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Moglia ranch house: Ranch house near the wind farm on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Stag ranch trailer: Trailer near the wind farm on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Santo Nino Road: Road also known as Dinn Ranch, extending to the east and providing vehicle access to Highway 16
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dinn Ranch: Ranch also known as Santo Nino Road
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16: Highway near the area where the vehicle was encountered
